rules_text:
Trample, haste
Thriving Hydra enters with four +1/+1 counters on it.
When Thriving Hydra enters, for each other creature you control, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature, where X is four minus its power.
Whenever Thriving Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
